apps.localizedDescription:
AltStore is an alternative app store for non-jailbroken devices. 

This version of AltStore allows you to install Delta, an all-in-one emulator for iOS, as well as sideload other .ipa files from the Files app.

permissions.usageDescription: SideStore periodically refreshes apps in the background to prevent them from expiring.
Allows SideStore to run longer than 30 seconds when refreshing apps in background.

news.title: Delta Gaining DS Support
news.caption: Available this Saturday for patrons, coming soon for everyone else.
Please read the FAQ for help with installing apps.
